## RecursiveArray type

A single value or a virtually unlimitedly nested array of this type of value

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RecursiveArray<T> = T | Array<RecursiveArray<T>>;
```
**References:** [RecursiveArray](./kassette.recursivearray.md)
